id.description: Value derived from the ID of the detected encounter represented by the RCDM profile 'Ronin NLP Detected Visit'

tenantId.description: ID of the tenant the patient belongs to

derivedFromDocumentReferenceId.description: Id of the Document reference cited in the Ronin NLP Detected Visit, stored without the reference prefix ('ronin-123', not 'DocumentReference/ronin-123')

typeSystem.description: System/protocol systemCode belongs to, always expected to be 'http://snomed.info/sct'

typeCode.description: Code corresponding to a particular type of 'Encounter'; NLP Detected Visits are always expected to contain only one CodeableConcept with this information

nlpDate.description: FHIR date-time at which the timeline event/encounter occurred; expected to be a date, but is technically able to be a date-time

nlpSourceIndexStart.description: Start index of where in the source document the encounter was found

nlpSourceIndexEnd.description: End index of where in the source document the encounter was found

invalidations.description: NLP Detected Visit Invalidations; expected to only ever have length 1 or 0

SaveNlpDetectedVisitRequestBody.title: Input structure for creating or updating an NLP Detected Visit

id.description: Value derived from the ID of the detected encounter represented by the RCDM profile 'Ronin NLP Detected Visit'; If not provided, a new id will be generated

tenantId.description: ID of the tenant the patient belongs to

derivedFromDocumentReferenceId.description: Id of the Document reference cited in the Ronin NLP Detected Visit, stored without the reference prefix ('ronin-123', not 'DocumentReference/ronin-123')

typeSystem.description: System/protocol systemCode belongs to, always expected to be 'http://snomed.info/sct'

typeCode.description: Code corresponding to a particular type of 'Encounter'; NLP Detected Visits are always expected to contain only one CodeableConcept with this information

nlpDate.description: FHIR date-time at which the timeline event/encounter occurred; expected to be a date, but is technically able to be a date-time

nlpSourceIndexStart.description: Start index of where in the source document the encounter was found

nlpSourceIndexEnd.description: End index of where in the source document the encounter was found

NlpDetectedVisitInvalidation.title: Invalidation of an NLP Detected Visit, originating from user action

userId.description: UDP ID of the user whose action the invalidation originated from
